group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Thank you for letting us borrow the kitchen.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]No problem! Today's a slow day@without a lot of orders, anyways.
[fontSize:20]...AND, I have my hands full preparing the@most delicious cheesecake in the world!
[fontSize:20]Lately, Nagisa has been a little glum...
[fontSize:20]So be sure to cheer her up@with your cake, all right?

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Ms. Sakie was worried about Nagisa, too.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]She might seem a little scatterbrained,@but she's actually pretty sharp.
[fontSize:20]Not only that, but she's been watching@over Nagisa since she came here.
[fontSize:20]So she's aware that Nagisa's been@pretty down for the past few days.

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]But, hmm...@I'm getting a little worried now.
[fontSize:20]Do you really think our cake will help?
[fontSize:20]If she truly wants to be saved from despair...
[fontSize:20]Then she won't ignore our efforts to help her.
[fontSize:20]I won't allow it, at any rate.

group_1.textAvCenter: [fontSize:20]All right then. Let's all do@our best to bake this cake!

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]To...sift? The cake flour?@How does that go?

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]So, you take the cake flour from the bag@and put it through a sieve, like this...
[fontSize:20]You do this because it can@get clumped up in the bag.
[fontSize:20]The sponge cake will turn out fluffy@with this sifting step.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Once you mix the eggs, sugar, and honey...@prepare a double boiler to...

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Bigger is more efficient.@There's nothing wrong with it.

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Mix cake flour into the batter...@Then, add in some unsalted butter...

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]I won't make the same mistake again.@How does this look?

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Now we just need to place the batter@into the mold...
[fontSize:20]Do it gently so you don't@smoosh the air bubbles, okay?
[fontSize:20]Gather up the batter with the spatula...
[fontSize:20]And when you scrape off the batter, you@do it carefully, as few times as possible.
[fontSize:20]Now we just drop the mold@to get rid of any excess air.

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Okay! Now, we just pray that it turns@into a fluffy sponge cake!

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]While the cake is set aside to cool,@let's get the decorations ready.
[fontSize:20]Miss Kaname, could you slice the strawberries?
[fontSize:20]And Miss Akemi, please whip up@the sugar into the cream.
[fontSize:20]I've got the chocolate message plate@to make. A super important task...

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]With your latte art skills,@I'm sure it's going to turn out great!

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Well, with chocolate,@the method is completely different...
[fontSize:20]Y-yeah! Homura, I think it's best@that you handle the whipping!

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]...If that's what you want, Madoka.@Whipping it is.

group_1.progressFnarration: (So...I need to draw something@on the chocolate.)
(But what kind of design would make@Nagisa happy...?)
(She seems to love cheese.@So, a cheesecake?)
(Wait, no...that's weird.@Why would you have a picture of@a cheesecake on a shortcake?)
(I need to think up a better design...)

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Does it matter? It won't affect the taste,@and it's going to get eaten anyways.

group_1.progressFnarration: (She really doesn't care about anything@unless it's related to Miss Kaname,@does she?)

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Um...do you happen to have@any extra white chocolate?
[fontSize:20]Put whipped cream and strawberries@between the slices...
[fontSize:20]Repeat this to complete the base, and once@that's done, cover the entire thing with cream...

group_1.textAvCenter: [fontSize:20]Lastly, we place the chocolate@message plate I made, and...
[fontSize:20]The Magical Girl Cake, created by the@helpers of RÃ©compense, is now complete!

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]I want to split that face on the@chocolate plate right down the middle...
[fontSize:20]But it IS amazing how you@captured Kyubey so accurately!

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Well, it's made out of pretty simple shapes.
[fontSize:20]So it's no big deal if it gets smashed!
[fontSize:20]All that aside, the cake is complete.
[fontSize:20]Which means all that's left is@to wait for Nagisa to arrive.

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]So let's hurry up and cut this cake.@To get her smiling again.

group_1.progressFnarration: (...Splitting Kyubey's face is DEFINITELY@all that's on this girl's mind.)

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]Madoka poured her heart and soul into@making this. She wanted to eat it with you.
[fontSize:20]Yes, and it's freshly made.@Let's hurry up and eat.
[fontSize:20]It's a strawberry shortcake!@Doesn't it look yummy?
[fontSize:20]It would be a shame to leave leftovers,@so if you'd like...

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]So...I don't need a cake from you, Madoka!

group_1.progressFnarration: (Her knife...just sliced Kyubey up@like in a slasher film...!)

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]You knew that acting like that@would make her angry, right?

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Since I do bad things...@I really AM a bad kid...

group_1.progressFnarration: (We really need to get@to the root of this.)

group_1.textAvLeft: [fontSize:20]If you're already aware you did something@bad, then just go and say you're sorry.
[fontSize:20]No more yapping, get those feet shuffling.
[fontSize:20]I can't take any more of this!
[fontSize:20]She's not a kid! She's a Witch!@And yet...!

group_1.textAvRight: [fontSize:20]Just like...what I saw in my dreams.
